page.title: 13My Day
page.content: I get up very slowly at 7.30 a.m. I walk half asleep into the bathroom for a wash.Then I go downstairs for a cup of tea-very refreshing! Then I get dressed and get everything ready for school. I'm off at 8.45. When I get to school I walk to the back playground for an exciting game of football.When the bell rings we all flock in and start reading. Then we have assembly; today was singing practice.Maths next, we're doing practical work. At dinner time I go to Jonathan's,today we had sandwiches.We go back to school at 1.15 p.m. and do "Going Places",I work with my partner Jonathan.After school I play cricket in the playground and then go home and have my tea.Bed time comes at 10.30.
